hadiths.text: Narrated AbuSa'id al-Khudri: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Nothing interrupt prayer, but repulse as much as you can anyone who passes in front of you, for he is just a devil

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَالَ لاَ يَقْطَعُ الصَّلاَةَ شَىْءٌ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Said That Nothing Nullifes The Prayer
